name: Konica Minolta
paragraphs: Konica Minolta Middle East, the printing solutions provider, struggled to reach their target audience in the market. Entourage was tasked with remodelling the entire communication strategy to increase brand awareness and brand recall for Konica Minolta in the region.

Being a holistic communication agency, we revamped PR and Social Media Communication tactics to ensure that the Konicaâ€™s message reaches its target audience. Due to our efforts, we saw a 70% increase in fans and followers, 80% increase in engagement on social channels.
